channel.title: Connecting
channel.description: Hey. So I recently put my server online, and I got no-ip running, and I portforwarded with uTorrent, and I even used the google server status checker and it says my server is online, but when I download the client to my laptop(which im using right now), it says I cant connect. Im able to connect on the computer im hosting on, but nothing else. Not even the other owner of my server can connect.. any help? Im able to use team viewer. Just say if you want to use my laptop or my hosting comp. THANKS!

item.title: Connecting
item.dc:creator: @mymadsskillz mymadsskillz
item.description:
@mymadsskillz wrote:

im having the same problem… i dont understand whats going on

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting

item.description:
@Xandra wrote:

Hey. So I recently put my server online, and I got no-ip running, and I portforwarded with uTorrent, and I even used the google server status checker and it says my server is online, but when I download the client to my laptop(which im using right now), it says I cant connect. Im able to connect on the computer im hosting on, but nothing else. Not even the other owner of my server can connect… any help? Im able to use team viewer. Just say if you want to use my laptop or my hosting comp. THANKS!
